long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Secure Your Feed with AI-Powered Tools 🧠
Protect yourself from fake and disinformation with our free Chrome extension. Equipped with advanced AI technology, our tool examines text, images and videos in your feed to detect fake information. Be certain that what you read, watch, and learn is authenticated 💂.

Why Use Leminda 💪💪💪?
➤ 🚨Real-Time Detection: Our AI assistant integrates seamlessly with X/Twitter, instantly analyzing content as you browse. We help you make informed decisions 
➤ 🛡️Fight Disinformation: Be a key part of our mission to stop the spread of fake news. With Leminda, you don’t just use the tool—you actively contribute to the solution. Each fake-check you perform is shared with others, helping protect the community from disinformation.

Features Include ✨:
🚀 Instant verification of text, images, and videos
🔄 Fully integrated with X for ease of use.
🔍 Claim checker: Safeguard the accuracy of the information you consume by distinguishing between verified facts and unproven claims.
🌐 Out-of-context test: Reveal the full context of media content by tracing it back to its original source across various platforms.
🛠️Media manipulation detection: Uncover edits and AI-generated content across different media types such as videos, images, text, and more.
💬 Social media insights: View incriminating user comments across various social media platforms to help you uncover the truth.
😈 AI-generated text detection: Spot AI-generated text to distinguish between human-created content and content produced by bots and bad actors.
🎬 Subtitle checker: Verify that video subtitles match the audio to ensure they haven't been modified to present misleading/ incorrect information.

Easy Installation  📲:
Click the blue "Add to Chrome" button.
Pin the Leminda icon to your Chrome menubar for quick access.

How It Works:
➤ Click the Leminda button on any post to start the verification process. If our AI detects disinformation, you’ll see immediate proof and explanations.

Join Our Community 🤝:
We are committed to developing innovative AI technologies to detect disinformation and fake news, empowering people worldwide to make informed decisions and fight against disinformation.

Help us improve by submitting feature requests and reporting bugs to info@leminda.com. Your feedback drives our innovation!

Install Leminda for Free and Secure Your Online World Today!
Visit Leminda.com for more information.
